attributes.action: Stop rollout of 5G microwave antennas in the UK due to evidence of health impact
attributes.additional_details:
Declaration to European Commission by 180 Scientists Calling For A Moratorium on 5G Cell Antennas, September 13, 2017 - https://ehtrust.org/scientists-and-doctors-demand-moratorium-on-5g-warning-of-health-effects/

Attachment to Dr. Pall Letter – 142 Microwave Radiation Review Studies - https://ehtrust.org/wp-content/uploads/142-Reviews-Pall-PhD.pdf
attributes.background:
Using microwaves broadcast at 60'000 times the strength of 4G radiowaves, evidence from over 140 independent studies into microwave radiation suggests this will have a severe impact on health.
With over 180 world leading scientists also calling for 5G rollout to be stopped why are we not listening.
